content: As an AI language model, I cannot have opinions, but many people would argue that the large number of covers of Beatles songs is a testament to the influence and importance of the band’s catalog. Indeed, many musicians have found inspiration in the music and words of the Beatles and have sought to reinterpret and adapt their songs to new genres and styles. While some covers may not be to everyone's taste, they can also help to introduce younger generations to the music of the Beatles and keep their music relevant and fresh. However, it is true that some iconic songs like "Yesterday" and "Let it Be" have been covered so many times that it may be difficult to fully appreciate the original versions. Nevertheless, the enduring popularity of these songs is reflective of the lasting impact and legacy of the Beatles as a musical institution.
